div.p:
Narrator:
Now, let’s make sure this list really captures what you care about. Take some time to pesonalize it by typing in a few specifics. You can make it a little more real by putting in the names of your family or friends. And if you want to swap values out, that’s okay too. For example, if you’re in a band you might change an item on the list to “music”. When you’re finished, the list should have ten values that reflect the most important things in your life.
